title.rendered: Alticor Inc Celebrates Construction Safety Week 2018

content.rendered:
Each year, Alticor Inc participates in Construction Safety Week, an industry-wide pursuit dedicated to raising awareness on the importance of construction safety and eliminating injury on the jobsite. Alticor Inc maintains an unwavering commitment to the safety of our people and trade partners as well as establishing a “zero-accident” culture. Our philosophy: “No job is so important it cannot be performed the safe way.”

During Construction Safety Week, the Alticor Inc’ team will engage in additional training, workshops and awareness-driven activities to encourage the continuous pursuit of a safe work environment. By implementing on-going SAFE principles, we COMMIT to saving lives and preventing injuries. To learn more about Alticor Inc’ dedication to safety, visit https://www.henselphelps.com/the-hensel-phelps-way/safety/
